affects:
ABILITY: Point Target
DAMAGE TYPE: Magical
PIERCES SPELL IMMUNITY: No
desc: Launches a ball of venom in a line, poisoning enemy units so that they take both initial damage and damage over time, as well as suffering slowed movement.  Venomous Gale deals damage every 3 seconds over its duration.
notes:
Units afflicted by Venomous Gale can be denied when their HP drops below 25%.
Duration damage is dealt every 3 seconds.
Slow starts at 50%, and decreases as time passes.
cmb:
125
22
lore: A concoction of various stings, poisons, and toxins gathered from the jungles of Jidi Isle, victims surviving it are rare.
name: venomancer_venomous_gale

desc: Adds poison damage to Venomancer's normal attacks, slowing movement speed.
notes:
Poison Sting damage can be lethal.
Damage from Poison Sting does not interrupt healing from items, nor does it activate the cooldown on Blink Dagger.
lore: The paralytic sting of the creature which caused his transformation now belongs to the Venomancer.
name: venomancer_poison_sting

affects:
ABILITY: Point Target
DAMAGE TYPE: Physical
PIERCES SPELL IMMUNITY: Yes
desc: Summons a plague ward to attack enemy units and structures. The ward is immune to magic. Wards gain the Poison Sting level from Venomancer, dealing 50% of the full damage.
cmb:
20/20/20/20
5
lore: A mixture of his old herbalist talents and newfound toxic mastery creates a living embodiment of plague.
name: venomancer_plague_ward

affects:
ABILITY: No Target
DAMAGE TYPE: Magical
PIERCES SPELL IMMUNITY: Yes
desc:
A spreading ring of poison that does damage over time to enemy units around Venomancer. Poison Nova cannot deal lethal damage; targets will be left with at least 1 health.
Upgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.
attrib:
RADIUS: 830/830/830
DURATION: 12/14/15
DAMAGE: 36/58/81
SCEPTER COOLDOWN: 140/120/60
SCEPTER DURATION: 14/15/16
SCEPTER DAMAGE: 58/81/108
cmb:
200/300/400
140/120/100
lore: In the Acid Jungles, creatures releasing noxious poison to their attackers is common; Venomancer spreads this plague beyond the Jidi Isle.
name: venomancer_poison_nova
